text: @K_JeanPierre @NicolleDWallace And, so... the physician who prescribed hydroxychloroquine for the @POTUS and who felt it within the best interest of public welfare to pen a document substantiating the benefit of an unproven medication to treat #COVID19, what is his liability in the practice of “do no harm”?
